name: b-s-zoku
description:
A beat em' up about gangin' up against ur ex...

Ugh, what a douchebag!

Play as Mikazuki, school girl turned baddie, fighting criminal vagabonds across Tokyo!

Designer and Writer - Phoebe Smith (@bunnyshepard)

Designer and Programmer - Tom Coeckelbergh

Programmer - Rita Rosa

Artist - Adele Richards

------

*Please note - there are bug fixes and features needing implementation!*
